headline: Is Southern Stock Still a Good Value After Clean Energy Investment News?
summary: Curious whether Southern is actually good value, or just priced that way? Here is what you need to know to get a clear answer. The stock has delivered a 2.2% gain over the past week, building on a year-to-date rise of 11.0% and a 7.3% gain over the past year. This has some investors wondering if the growth story is picking up, or if risks are being re-evaluated. Recent headlines about long-term clean energy investments and grid modernization efforts have provided fresh perspective on...

headline: DUK Stock Underperforms Industry in 6 Months: Here's How to Play
summary: Duke Energy's clean-energy push, nuclear expansion and major capital plans highlight growth potential despite its premium valuation.
